name: Rhinoceros
movement: 40 feet walking speed, fast for its size
description: A large herbivorous mammal with thick, tough skin and a distinctive horn on its nose, known for its immense physical strength.
memorable: Its charging attack can knock down foes while dealing significant damage with its horn.
goals: Usually grazes on plants and foliage but becomes highly aggressive when threatened.
relations: Often found alone in the wild, but may be seen with other herbivores.
strengths: High Strength score allows for powerful melee attacks and considerable resilience.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity means it is less agile, making it vulnerable in quick maneuvers.
attacks: The Gore attack can deal severe bludgeoning damage and potentially knock opponents prone.
most_powerful_ability: Charge ability enhances its Gore attack with extra damage and the chance to knock targets down.
senses: Possesses passive perception of 11, indicating average awareness of surroundings.
additional_information: Can perform a Multiattack for two Gore attacks per turn.
Quaking Stomp ability can knock nearby creatures prone.
Impressive natural armor provides basic defense.
Relatively high Constitution enhances its survivability.
Commonly solitary, making it a more unpredictable encounter.
test_queries: aggressive rhinoceros that knocks targets down
thick skinned herbivore with melee attacks
strong animal that charges with its horn
